docs.title: 1-TOPS RV32IMC SoC
docs.text: RTOS-capable RV32IMC System-on-Chip designed for student silicon tapeout.

docs.title: Objective
docs.text: Design and tapeout a minimal yet robust RV32IMC SoC capable of running FreeRTOS.

docs.title: 2.3 Clocking
docs.text: Single clock domain. PLL integration planned for tapeout.

docs.title: 3. Memory Map
docs.text: Region Base Address Size Description Boot ROM 0x0000_0000 64 KB Reset vector SRAM 0x2000_0000 256 KB Program/Data CLINT 0x0200_0000 64 KB Timer + SW interrupt PLIC 0x0C00_0000 4 MB External interrupt ctrl UART 0x1000_0000 4 KB Serial SPI 0x1001_0000 4 KB SPI Master I2C 0x1002_0000 4 KB I2C Master DMA (opt.) 0x1003_0000 4 KB Memory transfer engine

docs.title: 4.1 Pipeline
docs.text: 5-stage in-order pipeline: - IF - ID (C decompression) - EX - MEM - WB

docs.title: 5.2 Interrupt Flow
docs.text: Peripheral → PLIC → Core External Interrupt → CSR handling → RTOS ISR

docs.title: 6.1 Boot ROM
docs.text: Stores reset handler and RTOS startup code.

docs.title: 6.2 SRAM
docs.text:
Unified instruction and data memory.

No cache (deterministic RTOS behavior).

docs.title: 8.3 Privilege Model
docs.text: Machine mode kernel. User mode tasks (optional support).

docs.title: 9. Verification Strategy
docs.text:
• RTL simulation
